review: ONLY Connects to your TV in 1080p - no option to change to 720 or less. I use a projector, and component to hook up to it. It only supports 720p. All over this device they say 720p - but unless your TV / Projector supports 1080 - you wont see anything!What type of 1080p TV does not have smart tv built in? Not many. If you're hoping to use this on an older TV or Projector, good luck.Why would google do this? No options to downgrade the resolution?
author: Jan Ostrowski
